properties.description: On prem SQL Server hosting Cold Harbour GRG
Clears the Dest Tables then inserts the data  from AEMS tables to avoid data loss when issues with the transfer occur
Copies data from Fin tables from AH1 to Transform_DB
Copy data from the Homes table on AH1 to the Homes table on AH2. The integration truncates the table on AH2 and inserts all data again.

activities.name: Copy Homes Data
activities.description: Copies the data in the Homes table on AH1 to the Homes table on AH2

activities.name: INSERT_IDENTITY OFF
activities.description: Reset the Insert Identity to be OFF

activities.name: Truncate AH2 Homes table
activities.description: Truncates the Homes table on the AH2 server, clearing it of data and resetting the IDENTITY seed

activities.name: EXEC PopulateHomes FromvHome
activities.description: Avery.PopulateHomes$FromvHome Deletes data from the Avery.Homes table while the AH1 is master. And re-populates it data from the dbo.Homes table

properties.description: Copies the Occupancy Data from the AH1 to TRANSFORM DB and Avery DB on AH2

activities.name: Upsert to AH2 TRANSFORM
activities.description: Using the view vPowerAppOccupancy on AH1 Avery as the source, upserts the data using the ID field to Avery.PowerAppOccupancy in TRANSFORM DB

activities.name: Upsert to AH2 Avery
activities.description: Using the view vPowerAppOccupancy on AH1 Avery as the source, upserts the data using the ID field to Avery.PowerAppOccupancy in Avery DB

properties.description: Populates and keeps the home name table in the Agency DB up to date.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    HomeID,
    IntranetID,
    HomeName
FROM
    Avery.Home

properties.description: Copies across the Artisan AEM data
Copy Across Artisan Home details to the Artisan DB. (Uses the old AH1 table structure and data)

activities.name: Upsert Artisan Details
activities.description: Updates details from AH2 to the Artisan DB for the the Artisan Homes

properties.description: Copies across the Artisan Occupancy Data from AH1 to Artisan DB
